Class Canvas

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • Canvas
  • public class Canvas
extends greenfoot.Actor
    This class contains methods to make simple drawings. Extend this class to make your own canvas for drawing. Override the 'draw()' method in your subclass. Enter your drawing code in the 'draw()' method of the subclass

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor Description
      Canvas()

      void line​(double x1, double y1, double x2, double y2)
      Draw a line between coordinates (x1, y1) and (x2, y2)
      void oval​(double x, double y, double xRadius, double yRadius)
      Draw an oval with centre (x, y) and with xRadius and yRadius
      void rect​(double x, double y, double halfWidth, double halfHeight)
      Draw a rectangle centred on (x, y) with halfWidth and halfHeight

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw()
        Override and implement your drawing in this method. The canvas has coordinates (0, 0) in the bottom left corner and (1.0, 1.0) in the top right corner |-----|(1.0,1.0) | | | | (0,0)|-----|
